amendment.description: An amendment numbered 117 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce the salary of Xavier Becerra, Secretary of the Department of Health and Human Services, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 262, 1 Present (Roll no. 670).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 262, 1 Present (Roll no. 670).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
